description:
Managing drivers, vehicles, and orders all on one user interface.

To manage a fleet with economic efficiency and to keep all relevant details in view is a very challenging task. Stay on the safe side. Use the Fleetboard Cockpit, which combines all services booked by you in an easy-to-overview and intuitive user interface. This enables you to keep every detail in view and to conveniently access driver, vehicle, trailer and order data any time. For significantly less complexity and full transparency.
